author: John Hayward
title: Report: China Quietly Keeping Residences Quarantined Despite 'Reopening'...
description: China is reportedly imposing more coronavirus quarantines in Wuhan despite lifting the lockdown and declaring the city virus-free.
content: A report at the Epoch Times on Tuesday said that despite the much-ballyhooed grand reopening of Wuhan, the city at the heart of the coronavirus pandemic, and the confident proclamations of Chinese officials that the virus has been all but exterminated, quaran… [+3498 chars]
